original_text: And Elijah went to shew himself unto Ahab. And there was a sore famine in Samaria.
korean_text: 엘리야가 아합에게 보이려고 가니 그 때에 사마리아에 기근이 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Elijah went to shew himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 엘리야는 자신을 나타내기 위해 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: And there was a sore famine
